order.name: general
order.description: A born leader. Specializes in buffing their team and inspiring cooperation among their troops

order.name: Paladin
order.description: A guardian of the faith. This class specializes in protecting their allies and maintaining harmony in their battlefield

order.name: Samurai
order.description: A warrior of Honor. This class specializes in blade and swordplay. This class gets stronger the more they fight

balanace.name: Mystic Bladeslinger
balanace.description: A swordsman adept in the magical arts. Deals massive ammounts of damage quickly. Low defensive capabilities

balanace.name: Bandit
balanace.description: A class specifically designed for the element of surprise. Deals insanely high damage, but very low defense

balanace.name: Wizard
balanace.description: A skilled magician. This class specializes in spells and potions.

chaos.name: Soothsayer
chaos.description: A master of confusion and deception. This class specializes in moral disruption and manipulating others.

chaos.name: Dead Knight
chaos.description: A lone wolf in battle. Low damage and high defensive capabilities, however, this class excels in draining the life force of their enemies

chaos.name: Shadow Warrior
chaos.description: A warrior of shadows. This class specializes in shadow attacks and defensive abilities. This class gets stronger the more they fight
